tool_contract.name: laa

output_types.description: Amplicon consensus sequences in FASTQ format
output_types.title: Consensus Sequences

output_types.description: Chimeric/Noise amplicon consensus sequences in FASTQ format
output_types.title: Chimeric/Noise Consensus Sequences

output_types.description: Metadata for all resulting fastq sequences
output_types.title: Consensus Sequence Statistics CSV

schema_options.description: Fasta file of the barcode sequences used, overwriting any names in the DataSet. NOTE: Only used to find barcode names
schema_options.name: Barcode Fasta File

schema_options.description: Activate the chimera filter and separate chimeric consensus outputs
schema_options.name: Chimera Filter

schema_options.description: Minimum score to consider a sequence chimeric.
schema_options.name: Chimera Score Threshold

schema_options.description: Markov Clustering inflation parameter.
schema_options.name: Cluster Inflation Factor

schema_options.description: Markov Clustering loop weight parameter.
schema_options.name: Cluster Loop Weight

schema_options.description: Enable the coarse clustering
schema_options.name: Clustering

schema_options.description: Comma-separated list of barcode pairs to analyze, either by name, such as 'lbc1--lbc1', or by index, such as '0--0'.
schema_options.name: Barcode Name or Index Pairs

schema_options.description: Filter input reads by presence of both flanking barcodes.
schema_options.name: Use Only Full-Length Subreads

schema_options.description: Disable barcode filtering and treat all data as one sample.
schema_options.name: Disable Barcode Filtering

schema_options.description: When splitting, ignore N bases at the ends. Use to prevent excessive splitting caused by degenerate primers.
schema_options.name: Ignore End-Bases

schema_options.description: Output estimates of input PCR quality based on subread mappings
schema_options.name: Input Molecule Report Filename

schema_options.description: Output file for low-quality or chimeric results.
schema_options.name: Junk Filename

schema_options.description: Output file to write logging information to
schema_options.name: Log Filename

schema_options.description: Maximum number of input reads to cluster per barcode.
schema_options.name: Maximum Clustering Reads

schema_options.description: Maximum length of input reads, set 0 to disable.
schema_options.name: Maximum Subread Length

schema_options.description: Maximum number of reads to use for phasing/consensus.
schema_options.name: Maximum Phasing Reads

schema_options.description: Maximum number of input reads to cluster per barcode.
schema_options.name: Maximum Reads

schema_options.description: Minimum average barcode score to require of subreads.
schema_options.name: Minimum Barcode Score

schema_options.description: Minimum length of input reads.
schema_options.name: Minimum Subread Length

schema_options.description: Minimum predicted consensus accuracy below which a consensus is called 'noise'.
schema_options.name: Minimum Predicted Accuracy

schema_options.description: Minimum read score of input reads.
schema_options.name: Minimum ReadScore

schema_options.description: Minimum SNR of input reads.
schema_options.name: Minimum SNR

schema_options.description: Minimum fraction of reads favoring the minor phase required to split a haplotype.
schema_options.name: Minimum Allele/Haplotype Read Fraction

schema_options.description: Minimum number reads favoring the minor phase required to split a haplotype.
schema_options.name: Minimum Allele/Haplotype Reads

schema_options.description: Global likelihood improvement required to split a haplotype.
schema_options.name: Minimum Allele/Haplotype Score

schema_options.description: Path to a model file or directory containing model files.
schema_options.name: Model(s) Path

schema_options.description: Name of chemistry or model to use, overriding default selection.
schema_options.name: Model Override

schema_options.description: Enable the fine phasing step.
schema_options.name: Phasing

schema_options.description: Output file for summary report.
schema_options.name: Report Filename

schema_options.description: Output file for high-quality results.
schema_options.name: Result Filename

schema_options.description: RNG seed, modulates reservoir filtering of reads.
schema_options.name: RNG Seed

schema_options.description: Output prefix for subreads report.
schema_options.name: Subreads Report Filename Prefix

schema_options.description: Report only the top N consensus sequences for each barcode, set <1 to disable.
schema_options.name: Take Top N Sequences

schema_options.description: Trim N bases from each end of each consensus.
schema_options.name: Trim Sequence Ends
